title._content: Image taken from page 8 of 'A narrative of the irruption of the Kafir hordes into the Eastern Province of the Cape of Good Hope, 1834-35. Compiled from official documents ... by the editor of the "Graham's Town Journal" [i.e. Robert Godlonton]'

description._content: Image taken from: Title: "A narrative of the irruption of the Kafir hordes into the Eastern Province of the Cape of Good Hope, 1834-35. Compiled from official documents ... by the editor of the "Graham's Town Journal" [i.e. Robert Godlonton]" Author: GODLONTON, Robert. Shelfmark: "British Library HMNTS 9061.c.35." Page: 8 Place of Publishing: Graham's Town Date of Publishing: 1836 Publisher: Meurant & Godlonton Issuance: monographic Identifier: 004055438 Note: The colours, contrast and appearance of these illustrations are unlikely to be true to life. They are derived from scanned images that have been enhanced for machine interpretation and have been altered from their originals. If you wish to purchase a high quality copy of the page that this image is drawn from, please order it here.
